homeMainBody-1: Discover a delicious world with Minis' peanut-filled Mini Dragee. These small, round confections combine the satisfying crunch of a candy shell with the rich and enticing flavor of peanuts.
homeMainBody-2: Explore the indulgent universe of Minis' Chocolate Mini Dragee. Each piece is a delightful blend of smooth, creamy chocolate encased in a crisp candy shell, offering a symphony of textures and rich flavors that tantalize the taste buds
homeMainBody-3: Dive into the crunchy delight of Minis' Crispy Mini Dragee. These bite-sized treats feature a light, airy crispness, enveloped in a glossy candy coating. The perfect harmony of lightness and sweetness makes them an irresistible snack for any occasion.
ourStoryBody1: Minis was born from a simple yet powerful idea: to create miniature delights that bring joy. Founded by a team of food enthusiasts, we've dedicated ourselves to crafting bite-sized treats that not only satisfy your taste buds but also brighten your day. Our journey began with the vision of redefining snacking. We sought to blend quality, creativity, and deliciousness, resulting in the birth of Minis Mini Dragee with Peanut. At Minis, we're unwavering in our commitment to excellence. We use top-notch ingredients like whole peanuts, enrobed in a variety of candy coatings. This meticulous approach creates snacks that are not only delicious but also visually enticing.
ourStoryBody2: Our passion for crafting these little wonders has made Minis a symbol of quality and innovation in the snack industry. We continue to expand our range, offering you miniature, magnificent, and memorable experiences. As you savor Minis Mini Dragee with Peanut, you're enjoying a piece of our passion. Join us on this delectable journey, whether you're treating yourself or sharing with loved ones. Thank you for being a part of our story. We're excited to continue bringing you the joy of Minis, one bite at a time.
visionBody1: At Minis, we're dedicated to transforming snacking into a joy-filled experience. Our vision is to lead the way in creating exceptional, bite-sized delights that surprise and delight. We aim to be the go-to choice for those seeking quality, flavor, and fun in their snacks. Join us on our journey to redefine snacking, one Minis creation at a time.
visionBody2: Thank you for being part of our delicious dream.
missionBody1: Minis is on a mission to revolutionize snacking. Our purpose is to infuse joy and excitement into every snack-time moment. We are committed to crafting miniature delights that elevate your everyday experiences. Our mission is to continually push the boundaries of snack innovation, introducing new flavors, textures, and sensations that surprise and satisfy. We aspire to set the standard for what's miniature, magnificent, and memorable in the world of snacking.
missionBody2: We aim to be your first choice for snacks that perfectly balance quality, deliciousness, and fun. At Minis, our mission is to make snacking a source of delight for all, and we invite you to join us on this delicious journey. Thank you for being a part of our mission to redefine snacking, one Minis creation at a time.
crispyDragee: A snack combining crispiness and surprise. Each piece has a candy shell revealing a delightful interior.
chocolateDragee: Bite-sized treats with a chocolate core and crisp shell. Each offers a burst of rich chocolate and satisfying crunch.
peanutDragee: Mini treats with whole peanuts in a candy coating. The sweet shell contrasts with hearty peanuts for a satisfying crunch.
cornetteProduct: A delightful pastry filled with rich hazelnut cream and cocoa. Its flaky texture and creamy filling offer a perfect blend of crunch and smoothness.
umbrellaProduct: A whimsical chocolate treat shaped like an umbrella, crafted from smooth milk chocolate. Its playful form and creamy taste provide a joyous chocolate experience.
galleryBody: Explore our gallery to feast your eyes on a spectrum of colorful, delectable creations. From our vibrant candy-coated dragees to the luscious chocolate delights, each image tells a story of the joy we bring to snacking. Discover the artistry and delight in every miniature masterpiece.
contactBody: We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with us, and our friendly team will be here to assist you. Your thoughts matter, and we're here to ensure your experience with us is as delightful as our snacks. Contact us today!
catalog.title: Minis Catalog
